app.title: Steps Calculator
options.title: Options
calc-btn.label: Calculate
monthly_step_goal.label: Monthly step goal
close_btn.label: Close
hint.text: Hint: Fill in the form and press Calculate
predicted_days.text: At your current rate of {{avgStepsPerDay, number(maximumFractionDigits:0)}} steps per day, you will complete your steps {{projDaysRemain, relativetime(day)}}: {{dayToComplete,datetime}}.
congrats.text: Congratulations, you are done with your steps for the month!
goal-suggestions.option.label: {{ monthly_steps,number }} or about {{ daily_steps,number }} per day

history.title: Steps Log
history.help: This is a log of your steps for the month. You can add, remove, or edit entries.

table.summary: Found {{ count, number }} $t(entries, {"count": {{count}}}) between {{ fromDate, datetime }} and {{ toDate, datetime }}
table.caption: Log entries

fromDate.label: From Date
fromDate.title: Date of the earliest entry to show

toDate.label: To Date
toDate.title: Date of the latest entry to show
